Dear Supplier Manager
The Supplier {!Account.Name} , has been changed from {!BusinessPartnerRoleOldValue} to {!BusinessPartnerRoleNewValue} Following access is already available for the supplier To change the flag in NOLS please create a NOLS Contract in Contract DataBase and approve the change in NOLS. Please inform NOLS Support once CDB contract is created .
If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us at https://nsnsi.service-now.com/navpage.do
Best regards, NOLS support https://qa-online.networks.nokia.com
